HomePage.title: Welcome to Next.js 15 Enterprise App
HomePage.description: A modern, full-stack application built with the latest technologies

nextjs.title: Next.js 15
nextjs.description: Latest version with App Router and Server Components
nextjs.content: Built with the newest features including Server Actions and improved performance.

ui.title: Modern UI
ui.description: Beautiful components with Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui
ui.content: Responsive design with dark mode support and smooth animations.

auth.title: Authentication
auth.content: Multiple providers support with session management and protection.

i18n.title: Internationalization
i18n.content: Seamless language switching with proper routing and SEO.

monitoring.title: Analytics & Monitoring
monitoring.description: Comprehensive tracking with Vercel Analytics and Sentry
monitoring.content: Real-time insights and error tracking for better user experience.

testing.title: Testing
testing.description: Complete testing setup with Vitest and Playwright
testing.content: Unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end testing coverage.
